abstract.t: This document specifies the core automation-preferences.txt protocol, a machine-readable document that defines server-side automation permissions with a focus on essential controls for AI and automation use cases. Unlike the traditional robots.txt, which governs crawling, this protocol addresses a broader range of automation activities while maintaining simplicity for initial implementation. It defines the fundamental file format, policy declarations, HTTP method restrictions, and purpose requirements. Advanced features are addressed in a separate extension specification.
